Villa Arpel
Palm Springs
The Tati is hotel project inspired by the works of Oscar winning filmmaker Jacques Tati, an icon in film, design and architecture. It is known that French fashion and design of the 20th century were ahead of all trends. This new hotel has been originally conceptualized to become a cultural flagship venue of the most dominating aesthetic and visual culture of the mid-century, a living space for a new generation to discover or re-discover the Golden Age of design.
